#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

double v[100000], w[100000], u[100000];

const double INF = 1e7;
const double eps = 1e-8;

int n, m;

bool puc(double x) {
  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) u[i] = x * w[i] - v[i];
  nth_element(u, u + m, u + n);
  double ans = 0;
  for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i) ans += u[i];
  return ans <= 0;
}

int main() {
  cout.setf(ios::fixed);
  cout.precision(8);
  int t;
  cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    cin >> n >> m;
    double maxv = -INF, minw = INF;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
      cin >> v[i] >> w[i];
      maxv = max(maxv, v[i]);
      minw = min(minw, w[i]);
    }
    double l = 0.0, r = maxv / minw;
    while (l + eps < r) {
      double mid = (l + r) / 2.0;
      if (puc(mid)) l = mid;
      else r = mid;
    }
    cout << l << endl;
  }
}
